p.location_mentioned: Territory of Louisiana District of St Genevieve

div1.p: This sixth day of February one thousand Eight hundred and six this certifies that Moses Austin is authorized to vend merchandize in this district one year from the present date having this day paid me Henry Dodge Sheriff of the district of St Genevieve fifteen Dollars it being the anual tax imposed on the retailers of Merchandize by a law of this territory.

p.person_mentioned: H Dodge Sheriff of the district of St Genevieve
